page.title: 13Unemployment
page.content:
instructions,to sit down and concentrate for short lengths of time".It cost Â£46,000 to convert the 2 classroom block into the special unit,and Â£5,000 for the equipment. There are 4 nursery schools or units in our area.
UNEMPLOYMENT In April 1985,the total % of people unemployed in Newcastle was 18.4%;in Newburn 2,204 people were out of work. People interviewed lamented the high rate of unemployment in the area.They were worried about the lack of opportunity for young people of school leaving age.They believed that the situation was getting worse instead of getting better.
